metadata.title: ELSA-2023-6886:  plexus-archiver security update (IMPORTANT)
metadata.description:
[0:2.4.2-6]
- Avoid override target symlink by standard file in AbstractUnArchiver
- Fixes: CVE-2023-37460

[0:2.4.2-5]
- Fix arbitrary file write vulnerability
- Resolves: CVE-2018-1002200

[02.4.2-4]
- Mass rebuild 2013-12-27

[0:2.4.2-3]
- Rebuild to regenerate API documentation
- Resolves: CVE-2013-1571

[0:2.4.2-2]
- Update to latest packaging guidelines
- Remove MIT license (only applies to test cases not binary rpm)

[0:2.4.2-1]
- Update to upstream version 2.4.2
- Remove patch for CVE-2012-2098 (accepted upstream)

[0:2.3-1]
- Update to upstream version 2.3
- Use apache-commons-compress for bzip2 (de)compression
- Resolves: CVE-2012-2098

[0:2.2-6]
- Rebuilt for https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_19_Mass_Rebuild

[0:2.2-5]
- Update for https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_19_Maven_Rebuild
- Replace maven BuildRequires with maven-local

[0:2.2-4]
- Add ASL 2.0 license text to packages

[0:2.2-3]
- Migration to plexus-containers-container-default

[0:2.2-2]
- Fix source URL to be stable

[0:2.2-1]
- Update to upstream 2.2.

[0:2.1.1-2]
- Rebuilt for https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_18_Mass_Rebuild

[0:2.1.1-1]
- Update to latest upstream release.

[0:2.1-1]
- Update to latest upstream release.

[0:2.0.1-3]
- Rebuilt for https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_17_Mass_Rebuild

[0:2.0.1-2]
- BR maven-surefire-provider-junit4.

[0:2.0.1-1]
- Update to 2.0.1 version.

[0:1.2-2]
- Removal of plexus-maven-plugin dependency (not needed)
- Minor spec file changes according to the latest guidelines

[0:1.2-1]
- Update to 1.2.

[0:1.1-2]
- Rebuilt for https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_15_Mass_Rebuild

[0:1.1-1]
- Update to 1.1.

[0:1.0-0.4.a12.4]
- Install depmap and pom to override common poms.

[0:1.0-0.4.a12.3]
- Really ignore test failures.

[0:1.0-0.4.a12.2]
- Ignore test failures.

[0:1.0-0.4.a12.1]
- Update to alpha 12.

[0:1.0-0.4.a7.1.2]
- Rebuilt for https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_12_Mass_Rebuild

[0:1.0-0.3.a7.1.2]
- Rebuilt for https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_11_Mass_Rebuild

[0:1.0-0.2.a7.1.2]
- drop repotag
- fix license tag

[0:1.0-0.2.a7.1jpp.1]
- Autorebuild for GCC 4.3

[1.0-0.1.a7.1jpp.1]
- Update to alpha 7

[0:1.0-0.1.a6.1jpp.1]
- Fix rpmlint issues
- Version package to new jpp versioning standards
- Remove javadoc post and postun sections

[0:1.0-0.a6.1jpp]
- Upgrade to 1.0-alpha-6

[0:1.0-0.a3.2jpp]
- First JPP-1.7 release

[0:1.0-0.a3.1jpp]
- First JPackage build

criterions.comment: plexus-archiver is signed with the Oracle Linux 7 key
plexus-archiver-javadoc is signed with the Oracle Linux 7 key
plexus-archiver is signed with the Oracle Linux 7 key
plexus-archiver-javadoc is signed with the Oracle Linux 7 key
